pages.title: The begining
pages.text: Well? have you visited every biome?$(br)Have you built all your dreams?$(br)Have you finally claimed every bit that tiny piece of land you call the earth?$(br)Have you explored far and wide? Seen all that can be seen?$(br)WELL THEN, your tiny world is about to get a lot Bigger

$(br)Imagine the vast unknowns of space,all filled with stars,and planets with resources you have never seen before.$(br)Imagine driving rovers through harsh barren lands in the hope of finding life beyond earth.$(br)Building rockets that can go to the moon!, Rockets to other planets!, Rockets to other Stars!$(br)Imagine barren lava filled landscapes and frozen peaked mountaious terrain.Leave the little world you know and love and view the wonders yet to be descovered!
